document_data.mainbody:
Nhalien was an early knight of Neverwinter and the seventh of the Nine knights who served Lord Halueth Never. They were the basis for the Neverwinter Nine.
In a battle against the armies of Illusk, Nhalien saved Halueth from an arrow, but caught it in his chest and died instead. A statue of Nhalien and his sword later stood guard in Halueths tomb.
